about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a Full Stack developer focused on the MERN stack. I enjoy building beautiful interfaces with React or Next.js, and developing solid backend logic. While JavaScript is my main strength, I also know Python and have explored Django. I've worked with Payload CMS and touched a bit of React Native.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.text: I mainly work with React and Next.js to create clean, fast, and responsive interfaces. I focus on making designs not only visually appealing but also accessible and functional across all devices.

backend.title: Backend
backend.text: I'm specialized in Node.js with Express and MongoDB, but also have experience with Python and Django. I enjoy designing efficient and scalable APIs. I've used Payload CMS in several projects and I'm familiar with JWT, authentication, and other common backend features.

skills.title: SKills
skills.description: These are the technologies I work with

items.description: Development of custom websites for clients from various industries using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). Implementation of modern, responsive interfaces with Tailwind CSS. Integration of custom functionalities such as forms, admin panels, and authentication systems. Full project lifecycle management, from design to deployment.

Full-stack development of web applications using Next.js, React, Payload CMS, and MongoDB. Frontend development with TypeScript and state management using Redux. Backend development with Node.js and implementation of secure APIs with authentication and authorization. Integration of third-party APIs. Close collaboration with clients to identify and address their business needs. Version control with Git (Bitbucket/GitHub).
